newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: PAKISTAN STOCKS CLOSE HIGHER, LED BY ICI.
newsitem.headline: PAKISTAN STOCKS CLOSE HIGHER, LED BY ICI.

text.p: Pakistani stocks closed higher on Friday, led by ICI Pakistan, and Karachi dealers said prices were likely to open up after the weekend.
The 100-index closed 13.84 points, or 0.69 percent, higher at 2,027.05, but still off the day's high of 2,035.71. Losers led gainers 131 to 69 at the close at 12.15 p.m. (0715 GMT).
One dealer said blue chips were likely to ease on profit-taking in computerised trading in the evening.
ICI Pakistan rose 1.30 rupees to 30.85 ahead of its board meeting on Tuesday.
